Author: X
Comment: Turashimira cyane gahunda nziza yo gutwara abantu muri kigali .Ariko hasigaye ikintu kimwe bigafasha kurushaho umuturage akagenda neza .niba ligne yaruyenzi na gihara ndetse nahandi hari abagenzi benshi cyane,kuki bashyiraho ligne ya nyabugogo gusa Kandi hari abaturage benshi bifuza kujya mumugi gusa?NB:bashyizeho ligne ya nyabugogo na ligne yo mumugi .abantu bakagera Aho bifuza kujya .icyo nicyo ikibazo gisigaye gusa gikomeye muri transport.

Author: Iyamuremye Telesphore
Comment: Ibi ni sawa cyane! Umuntu azajya ava m'urugo yabiteguye kuko ikiguzi cyo kugenda gifite icyo gihungabanya k'ubukungu bwe. Ubundi kubona ko transiport yoroshye byatumaga n'udafite impavu yihutirwa yatuma agenda abikora bityo ugasanga n'umuvundo uhora muri za garre no ku ma bus. Ibi byongere byibutse abantu ko bakwiye gukora ingendo zifite icyo zigamije kandi ziri ngombwa.

Author: Rubadha
Comment: Ariko uhundi reta y'urwanda kuki ikabya kuba incutuzi, akantu kose ni zana zana, njye mbona ariyo ifite intandaro y'itakaza gaciro kigaranga, kuko niba service ziganda zihenda tuzasanga ifaranga ntakintu tikimaze kugeza n'ubwo 10.000frw bitakigira icyo bigura, kurinza uamafaranga y'ingendo bivuze kurira kw'izindi service zizishamikiyeho, rero uko ubuzima buhenda ninako imibereho y'abantu ihazaharira. Nukuri Imana iturengere.

Author: Kalisa
Comment: Njye ku bwanjye ndashimira Leta y' u Rwanda kuko ubufasha bwayo hari byinshi bwadufashije kuri iyo Nkunganire twibutse gushimira nubwo baducukije ariko byose bifatanira hamwe kutuzanira ibyiza kuko Organization muri Transport mu Rwanda ni hacye wayisanga n' ubwo ntabyera ngo de ariko ntakundi

Author: Popi
Comment: Amafaranga ya mutation badusoneye niyo agiye kwishyurwa n'ibi bintu byose se? HhhhhhhCyakoze imisoro turayitanga pe.Iyo nkunganire ijya kujyaho ko mutabitubwiye?Abari barimukiye mu migi yunganira Kigali ndabasuhuje ariko! Hhhhhhh sha muzagaruka tuh. Ubwo amashanyarazi n'amazi nabyo ngo bigiye kwiyongera noneho amagambo ashire ivuga ,uwonswaga acutswe . HhhhhhhSha cyakoze kera abantu bazabina inkuru bazajya baganira pe.Ndatangaye.Nkunganire zose zigiye kuvaho kuko amafaranga akanewe ni menshi.Gushaka abagore tuzabyiga mu mateka.

Author: Fils
Comment: Utu duceri mugenda murenzaho rimwe na rimwe natwo duhendesha abagenzi cyane cyane abajya mu ntara kuko ahenshi ntibakunze kugarura akwiye ugasanga umugenzi bamugaruriye make bati ihangane nta biceri dufite.urugero: nk'aha iMuhanga:1506 Frw, ibi biceri birengaho biragoye kubibona bityo bisaba ko umugenzi atanga menshi akagarurirwa make.Igiciro kivuyeho ubanza yari 1032fr; akenshi bagusabaga 1100fr bakakugarurira 50fr; hari uwakumva ari make (18fr) ariko ugereranije n'umubare w'abagenzi ku munsi(urugero:1,000) usanga aya mafaranga ageze kuri 18,000 fr.Niba ntacyo bitwaye ubutaha bajye bashyiraho igiciro mu mafaranga byoroshye kwishyura.Ahakoreshwa amakarita ho iki kibazo ntagihari.Murakoze

Author: Com
Comment: Nta kundi twabigenza ariko ababishinzwe badufashe kuko kugenda muri ziriya modoka bahimbye shirumuteto ukurikije umubare w'abantu bapakirwamo ni ikibazo gikomeye, umuntu yibaza niba ziriya modoka zitagira umubare ntarengwa zigomba gutwara bikakuyobera pe. Bapakiramo abantu ku buryo ari uvuye mu biro, mu igaraje, mu murima, mu isoko, abagufi n'abarebare kuburyo abantu bagenda begeranye cyane, reka ntawavuga ababa bari munsi y'ukwaha bw'abandi bitewe nuko ari bagufi, kugenda abantu bakubanaho kandi bose baba batakoze isuku kimwe cg ngo babe bambaye imyenda idashobora kubangamirana bitewe n'uko kwikubanaho, mbega birababaje. ikindi ni imirongo ikabije ndetse no kuaba abantu bategereza imodoka ku byapa igihe kinini, ariko reka turebe niba koko ibyo umujyi wa Kigali uvuga uzabikora.
